name: Charleston BLT Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: How do you better a BLT? Turn it into a dip. With five easy ingredients--bacon, mayo, sour cream, tomatoes and McCormick® French Onion Dip Seasoning Mix--you can whip up this dip before the big game starts. Load it on to toasted bread or crackers and discover for yourself why Charleston is so beloved for bacon.
ingredients: ½ pound bacon strips, cooked and crumbled
2 medium tomatoes, seeded and finely chopped
1 (0.53 ounce) package McCormick® French Onion Dip Seasoning Mix
directions: Mix all ingredients in large bowl until well blended
